alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 9:09PM PST until March 07 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. Strongest winds in the western Santa Ynez mountains and adjacent foothills. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains and Santa Barbara County South Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes Highways 101 and 154, as well as the Gaviota and San Marcos Passes. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast
